489970.name: Mugen Souls Z - Ultimate Weapon Bundle
489970.description:
Includes the following DLC packs:

Strength! Hyper Weapon Pack 1: Includes Fan of Dominance, Dream Fantasy, Shard of Seven.

Super! Hyper Weapon Pack 2: Includes Bitter Wrath, Magical Girl Staff, School Bloomers, Elder Sister Scarf.

Battle! Hyper Weapon Pack 3: Includes Fin Gun, Mystery Barrel, 7 World Rosary, Super Sage Scroll.

Bravado! Hyper Weapon Pack 4: Includes Hero Bazooka, Single Lens Launcher, Utopian Earrings, Smarty-Pants PC.

Ferocity! Hyper Weapon Pack 5: Includes Duelling Knuckles, Metal Blazer, Championship Medal, Yo-Gi-Uh Card.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here:

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
